mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS no, t.* FROM tuition t, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP ORDER BY yearmonth DESC
SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS no, m.name FROM tuition t, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP INNER JOIN member m ON t.student_id = m.id ORDER BY yearmonth DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tuition(depositor, status, amount, depositdate, memo, yearmonth, name) VALUES (#{depositor }, #{status }, #{amount }, #{depositdate }, #{memo }, #{yearmonth }, #{name })
